entry.value:
SELECT `p`.`ProjectID` AS `ProjectID`, `p`.`title` AS `title`, `p`.`objective` AS `objective`, `p`.`instrument` AS `instrument`, `p`.`startDate` AS `startDate`, `p`.`endDate` AS `endDate`, `p`.`totalCost` AS `totalCost`, `p`.`area` AS `area`, `p`.`topic_water` AS `topic_water`, `l`.`text_lemmatized` AS `text_lemmatized`
FROM (`total_projects` `p` JOIN `total_projects_lemmas` `l`)
WHERE `p`.`ProjectID` = `l`.`ProjectID` limit 19

entry.value:
SELECT appln.appln_id,appln.appln_auth,appln.appln_kind,appln.appln_filing_date, tittle.appln_title_lg, tittle.appln_title, abstr.appln_abstract_lg,abstr.appln_abstract FROM tls201_appln appln,tls202_appln_title tittle, tls203_appln_abstr abstr
WHERE appln.appln_id=tittle.appln_id AND appln.appln_id=abstr.appln_id AND abstr.appln_abstract_lg="en" AND appln.appln_id=3

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value: SELECT appln.appln_id,appln.appln_auth,appln.appln_kind,appln.appln_filing_date, tittle.appln_title_lg, tittle.appln_title, abstr.appln_abstract_lg,abstr.appln_abstract FROM tls201_appln appln,tls202_appln_title tittle, tls203_appln_abstr abstr WHERE appln.appln_id=tittle.appln_id AND appln.appln_id=abstr.appln_id AND appln.appln_id >60000000 and appln.appln_id<=61000000

SELECT appln.appln_id,appln.appln_auth,appln.appln_kind,appln.appln_filing_date, tittle.appln_title_lg, tittle.appln_title, abstr.appln_abstract_lg,abstr.appln_abstract FROM tls201_appln appln,tls202_appln_title tittle, tls203_appln_abstr abstr
WHERE appln.appln_id=tittle.appln_id AND appln.appln_id=abstr.appln_id AND abstr.appln_abstract_lg="en" AND appln.appln_id BETWEEN 465000000 AND 485000000
